CSAS_OUTPUT_0.OUTPUT.schema: `ROWKEY` STRING KEY, `KSQL_COL_0` BOOLEAN, `KSQL_COL_1` INTEGER, `KSQL_COL_2` BIGINT, `KSQL_COL_3` DOUBLE, `KSQL_COL_4` STRING, `KSQL_COL_5` ARRAY<INTEGER>, `KSQL_COL_6` MAP<STRING, INTEGER>, `KSQL_COL_7` STRUCT<`F0` INTEGER>

testCase.name: of nulls
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (IGNORED STRING) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='test_topic', VALUE_FORMAT='JSON');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT
  CAST(null AS BOOLEAN) KSQL_COL_0,
  CAST(null AS INTEGER) KSQL_COL_1,
  CAST(null AS BIGINT) KSQL_COL_2,
  CAST(null AS DOUBLE) KSQL_COL_3,
  CAST(null AS STRING) KSQL_COL_4,
  CAST(null AS ARRAY<INTEGER>) KSQL_COL_5,
  CAST(null AS MAP<STRING, INTEGER>) KSQL_COL_6,
  CAST(null AS STRUCT<F0 INTEGER>) KSQL_COL_7
FROM TEST TEST
EMIT CHANGES;
